Services.name: Door to Door Scrap Pickup
Services.text: We provide hassle-free, eco-friendly scrap collection right at your doorstep. Schedule a pickup

Services.name: Packaging Industry Scrap
Services.text: Efficient collection of cardboard, plastic wraps, and packaging waste from factories, warehouses, and logistics hubs

Services.name: Construction Site Scrap
Services.text: Professional removal of metal, concrete debris, wood, and other construction waste

Services.name: IT Companies Scrap
Services.text: Secure and certified disposal of old computers, servers, cables, and electronic waste.

Services.name: College Institution Scrap
Services.text: Paper, lab waste, furniture, and e-waste collection from schools, colleges, and offices.

Services.name: Printing Press Scrap
Services.text: Specialized collection of paper offcuts, misprints, ink cartridges, and aluminum plates

Testimonials.text: Their scrap pickup service has saved us so much space and hassle
Testimonials.name: Rahul Sharma

Testimonials.text: We rely on them for debris removal after every project. Theyâ€™re punctual, professional, and recycle 90% of the waste

Testimonials.text: Their e-waste disposal is secure and compliant. They even provided data destruction certificates for our old servers
Testimonials.name: Vikram Mehta

Testimonials.text: They buy our misprints and paper scraps at fair rates.
Testimonials.name: Sanjay Malhotra

Testimonials.text: Our campus is now cleaner thanks to their regular paper and lab waste pickups. The students appreciate the eco-friendly initiative!
Testimonials.name: Dr. Ananya Joshi

Testimonials.text: We generate tons of waste daily, and their scrap pickup team has been a game-changer!
Testimonials.name: Aditya Nair

Features.title: Door to Door Pickup
Features.text: We provide door to door pickup service for our customers.

Features.title: Special Waste
Features.text: We accept special waste collection at many locations.

Features.title: Construction Site Scrap
Features.text: PVC Pipe Scrap, All kind of Metal Scrap, Waste Kraft, GI Pipe cut pieces, Used Copper / Aluminum Wires etc.

Features.title: IT Companies Scrap
Features.text: Old Monitors, CPUs, Printers, Telephone, Servers, UPS and many more.
